verses.verse: David's <S%H1732><s%> Psalm of praise. <S%H8416><s%> I will extol <S%H7311><s%> thee, my God, <S%H430><s%> O king; <S%H4428><s%> and I will bless <S%H1288><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>
Every <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> will I bless <S%H1288><s%> thee; and I will praise <S%H1984><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>
Great <S%H1419><s%> is the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and greatly <S%H3966><s%> to be praised; <S%H1984><s%> and his greatness <S%H1420><s%> is unsearchable. <S%H369><s%> <S%H2714><s%>
One generation <S%H1755><s%> shall praise <S%H7623><s%> thy works <S%H4639><s%> to another, <S%H1755><s%> and shall declare <S%H5046><s%> thy mighty acts. <S%H1369><s%>
I will speak <S%H7878><s%> of the glorious <S%H3519><s%> honor <S%H1926><s%> of thy majesty, <S%H1935><s%> and of thy wondrous <S%H6381><s%> works. <S%H1697><s%>
And men shall speak <S%H559><s%> of the might <S%H5807><s%> of thy terrible acts: <S%H3372><s%> and I will declare <S%H5608><s%> thy greatness. <S%H1420><s%>
They shall abundantly utter <S%H5042><s%> the memory <S%H2143><s%> of thy great <S%H7227><s%> goodness, <S%H2898><s%> and shall sing <S%H7442><s%> of thy righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is gracious, <S%H2587><s%> and full of compassion; <S%H7349><s%> slow <S%H750><s%> to anger, <S%H639><s%> and of great <S%H1419><s%> mercy. <S%H2617><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> to all: <S%H3605><s%> and his tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> are over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his works. <S%H4639><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> thy works <S%H4639><s%> shall praise <S%H3034><s%> thee, O LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and thy saints <S%H2623><s%> shall bless <S%H1288><s%> thee.
They shall speak <S%H559><s%> of the glory <S%H3519><s%> of thy kingdom, <S%H4438><s%> and talk <S%H1696><s%> of thy power; <S%H1369><s%>
To make known <S%H3045><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> his mighty acts, <S%H1369><s%> and the glorious <S%H3519><s%> majesty <S%H1926><s%> of his kingdom. <S%H4438><s%>

Thy kingdom <S%H4438><s%> is an everlasting <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5769><s%> kingdom, <S%H4438><s%> and thy dominion <S%H4475><s%> endureth throughout all <S%H3605><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%> <S%H1755><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> upholdeth <S%H5564><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that fall, <S%H5307><s%> and raiseth up <S%H2210><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> those that be bowed down. <S%H3721><s%>

The eyes <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> wait <S%H7663><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> thee; and thou <S%H859><s%> givest <S%H5414><s%> them <S%H853><s%> their meat <S%H400><s%> in due season. <S%H6256><s%>
Thou openest <S%H6605><s%> <S%H853><s%> thine hand, <S%H3027><s%> and satisfiest <S%H7646><s%> the desire <S%H7522><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> living thing. <S%H2416><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is righteous <S%H6662><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and holy <S%H2623><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> his works. <S%H4639><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is nigh <S%H7138><s%> unto all <S%H3605><s%> them that call <S%H7121><s%> upon him, to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> upon him in truth. <S%H571><s%>
He will fulfill <S%H6213><s%> the desire <S%H7522><s%> of them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him: he also will hear <S%H8085><s%> their cry, <S%H7775><s%> and will save <S%H3467><s%> them.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> preserveth <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> them that love <S%H157><s%> him: but all <S%H3605><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will he destroy. <S%H8045><s%>

My mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> the praise <S%H8416><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and let all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> his holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>
